snippet: A former director of technology for Sony Pictures Entertainment has sued the company over the data breach that resulted in the online posting of his private financial and personal information....

headline.print_headline: Sony Faces 4th Ex-Employee Lawsuit Over Hack
headline.main: Sony Faces 4th Ex-Employee Lawsuit Over Hack

lead_paragraph: A former director of technology for Sony Pictures Entertainment has sued the company over the data breach that resulted in the online posting of his private financial and personal information.
